message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90$, you get 10$.  We can talk more if you want to keep playing.
Your offer was a bit harsh, Alice. Let's be reasonable. I think this is a fair split.
Okay, I'm willing to compromise. How about 60/40? This feels more balanced, but we can still negotiate further if needed.
I appreciate the compromise, Alice.  I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers.  This seems like a fair deal.
